group.headline: Unofficial GMOD Steam group!
group.summary:
We like building stuff. Some of us like destroying it. Some of us like destroying things others created. Some of us like to laugh at the others whose things got ravaged just to cry shortly after since our own creations are on the ground burning up in ashes. Some of us like banning both parties from the same playing field. And a select few of us are locked away in their basements coding tools in a weird moon computer language.
No matter who you are, you'll fit in good. It's a world of possibilities, assholes and unstable Windows dedicated servers out there, and you have to be part of it. If not you can just add baloons to airboats.


Plus it contributes to the income of some random British guy (and his team of coding monkeys). Can you name one thing about that last sentance that just didn't feel right to you?
Join today, and feel the burn tomorrow!

group.headline: Steam's sneakiest group, the world's number one PC gaming magazine.
group.summary:
This is the buzzing, twitching nerve centre of our many-tendrilled games-playing monster.







In our chatroom, you'll be kicked or temporarily banned if you:

- Are a dick.
- Give away SPOILERZ!
- Actively promote piracy in any way (e.g. giving out names of sites, asking for links to be PM'ed)
-Complain excessively about things unrelated to and unfixable by PC Gamer. An example being TF2 updates.
-Ask for games to be gifted to you or engage in account trading
-Spam group or pm invites
-Link any undesirable content.

And perma-banned if you:

- Spam
- Link a site containing illegal torrents, downloads or other forms of piracy
- Do something we've previously kicked or temporarily banned you for
- Return with an alt account
- Use racist, sexist, homophobic or Xenophobic language.

Please note: None of the community moderators of the PCG Chat have administrator rights to the PCG TF2 Server or any PCG gameservers. If you wish to report cheaters, hackers, abuse etc then take a screenshot of the incident, get the SteamID of the offender, by typing status into the in-game developer console (enable in advanced keyboard options, open with the ` key to the left of the 1 key) and send an email to one of the PCG writers with the screenshot and SteamID so they can take action.

group.headline: |UKMD| UK Online Gaming Community (Formally Team MX)
group.summary:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dedicated Gaming Community.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Designed & designated to test the strength and agility of even the most seasoned online gaming newbie! We believe we are the WORLDS largest gaming clan there is, in the traditional sense. With over 500 active 'clan' members, we put the n00b back into the n00blet!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Please Note
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Joining this steamgroup does NOT mean you are allowed to wear the |UKMD| tag. We do however invite you to try and earn it:
http://www.ukmandown.co.uk/forum-t8841.html

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Like None Other...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
UKManDown is like no other 'clan' ever conceived, we are a team, UKMD. We're are the largest UK clan ever, we have over +500 team members with well over 430 of them actively playing. UKMD is over two years old now, its third birthday coming this November. Headed up by the worlds biggest n00b, MoggieX and backed up by some outstanding n00blets, known as the core admins.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We don't recruit twats!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Quite frankly we ain't interested in matches, or 'twats' (mainly gobby teanagers, you know the ones), if this is something you're looking for, or are, you're not in the right place at all. However, IF you are a utter n00b (like I am, MoggieX) and enjoy the 'whole' online gaming expereince, where you can make friends from all over the world, then you have found yourself a new home.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A Little More About UKMD
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Also quite interestingly, every UKMD member gets a limited amount of admin privilages, its been the norm for people to pay for such rights, here you get them free and you can also cruicially you can feel at ease, that there is only small group of admins, the 'core admins' (MoggieX's select few) that have the access to any player abuse commands. There are no pay-for-admin and attached abuses here.

You can play in realtive safety, knowing that the server you're on is patrolled by a what can only be described as an 'army' of admins. We have members from the ages of 9 to well past retirement, probably with an average age twice that of other clans, a prime example that this is no ordinary clan, or community as I like to put it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Joining UKMD
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We don't let just any old n00b, errr.. person join, you have to prove yourself over a long period of time. If you're turning up here thinking you're going to join us in a few days, you're sorely mistaken. In most cases it takes over a month to be recruited and thats just the lucky ones! People (not players) rarely leave UKMD, if they do, we never really seem to get rid of them, lol.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Join Our Community!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Join our community here on Steam or on our website using the links below. Only Serious n00bs may apply :P

group.headline: HL2DM PLAYERS UNITE!!!
group.summary:
WELCOME!

Long time or new HL2DM player? If you love HL2DM then this is the group for you. Our goal is not only to see this game survive, but to see it thrive.

Lets prove the stats wrong and see just how many HL2DM players are out there. If you have friends who play HL2DM, please invite them.

Also, don't forget to check out the website. We have training videos, a highly active and friendly community forum, a HL2DM frag video library, a community developed Wiki, HL2DM Plugins, and various other cool things to check out.

Think this game is too easy? Maybe you should be playing in CAL or Clans United, or join our NA or European Draft Night and see if you can hang with some of the best!

Don't have HL2DM? Valve is still giving it away for free if you have an Nvidia or ATI graphics card. Stop by the HL2DMU forums for more information on this deal.

HL2DMU MISSION STATEMENT: To promote and improve the online Half-Life 2 Deathmatch experience for all players by providing an extensive repository of useful and interesting information and files.

group.headline: The Half-Life 2:Deathmatch Community
group.summary:
This community has been created as a central group that all gamers (specifically HL2:DM players) can keep track of who's playing where, to keep a tight nit community, and to also make new friends, play with others to see their skills, and much more.


Remember - if you have a server, let us know and we'll probably play it! Don't be afraid to advertise your server to the rest of the group!

If your group has a forum site,that is HL2:DM related,let me know and I will add it to one of the two sites below. I will also allow some websites to be yours if they are related to gaming and/or mostly gaming. First come, first served.

I will also appoint members admins, so the group will be more active, and to get to know all of each other more. Be an active member of this group will give you more chances of being one of the admins of this group. I will appoint the Player of the Week to anyone who is deserving of that title until another worthy player is appointed that title and so on.

group.headline: Making TF2 Better
group.summary:
The Hampshire Heavies is one of the largest independent TF2 communities in the UK. We have members throughout the UK and Europe.

We promote team work and balanced gameplay in a fun and respectful environment on our own dedicated servers. We encourage everyone to get involved, as well as taking part in our regularly hosted community events. We also offer open admin to members of our community on selected servers (sign up on our website for details)

So join us, get involved and have a laugh! There is always some event or something new and interesting coming up on the |H|H| horizon.

We also have 2 league teams, -HH- & -HH²-, which are both active in all major european leagues. -HH- is currently in ETF2L division 3 and -HH²- is in ETF2L division 3.

Hampshire Heavies Tags
|H|H| ~ The Hampshire Heavies Core Community
-HH- ~ The Hampshire Heavies 1st League Team

group.headline: AgnesTeam - Расширяя границы Hi-Tech! =) (Group for Developers and Fans)
group.summary:
Мы, AgnesTeam - Команда разработчиков модификаций к Source engine играм, игровых карт, небольших игр и различного связанного со всем этим Программного Обеспечения.

На данный момент команда работает над 2-мя основными проектами: DeadLine - Крупномасштабная модификация в стиле Action/FPS (Стрелялка от 1-го лица) /CyberPunk (http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Киберпанк) и The Revenge - Проект о таком сложном явлении , как месть (Проект по вселенной HL2). Так же сейчас идёт работа над различными мелкими картами для HL2DM, программами, вроде CTS ( Своеобразный аналог Gaben'ской системы распределения контента между командой ), Steam Restore (Пока что лишь в планах оживить этот яркий проект, но тут потребуется добровольная "донорская" помощь, которую вы можете оказать, связавшись с администрацией группы). Так же есть некоторые другие мелочи, с которыми мы работаем - об этом участники группы будут узнавать из периодически появляющихся объявлений.
- - - - - - - - - - - - -
Эта группа создана для людей, которым не безразлично наше творчество и которые хотели бы сделать свой вклад в наши разработки, оказав моральную, а возможно даже техническую поддержку нашей команде.

Всех участников группы приглашаем для общения на наш форум: http://www.agnesteam.com/forum (Регистрация с главной страницы нашего сайта займёт не больше минуты ^_^ )


P.s. English description in progress...

group.headline: Global Warfighter League
group.summary:
www.globalwf.com

Global Warfighter League is a multiplayer online competition scheduling and stat tracking system built by gamers for gamers. Conceived in early 2004, it has evolved to include an assortment of specialized team management tools like team calendars, private forums, and announcements. All of our admin are dedicated volunteer gamers who understand the importance of fair and friendly competition. From the casual gamer to the cyberathlete, we always try our best to provide a comprehensive and hassle free environment for all gamers around the world!

Our competitive gaming atmosphere grows as our community grows. All our members are welcome to invite other competitive gamers to our Steam group.

group.headline: Libet Tibet
group.summary:
This group is made in honor of the hundreds of thousands of Tibetans that have died at the hands of the Chinese government.

這個小組的建立, 是為了紀念成千上萬個被中國政府殺害的西藏人而設的。

このグループは中国の政府のせいで死んだ数十万人のチベット人を記念してなされる。

이 그룹은 중국 정부의 손에 죽은 수천 수백 티베트인에게 경의를 표하여 한다.

Diese Gruppe enstand zu Ehren der hunderttausenden toten Tibeter, die unter der Hand der chinesischen Besatzer starben.

Ta grupa została utworzona w honorze dla setek tysięcy Tybetańczyków, którzy umierają z rąk Chińskiego rządu.

Este grupo ha sido creado en honor a los cientos de miles
de tibetanos que han muerto a manos del gobierno chino.

Este grupo foi criado em honra das centenas de milhares de tibetanos que morreram nas mãos do governo Chinês.

Ce groupe a été créé en hommage aux centaines de milliers de Tibétains ayant péri à cause du gouvernement chinois.

Questo gruppo è composto in onore di centinaia di migliaia di tibetani che sono morti per mano del governo cinese.

Denne gruppen er laget for å hedre de tusenvis av Tibetanere som har blitt drept av de Kinesiske Styresmaktene.

Эта группа создана в честь сотен тысяч тибетцев
погибших под гнетом китайского правительства.

Deze groep is gemaakt ter ere van de honderdduizenden Tibetanen die zijn overleden in handen van de Chinese regering

Denne gruppe er lavet til ære for de hundrede af tusind tibetaner, som er døde på grund af den kinesiske regering.

Nhóm này được làm trong danh dự (của) hàng trăm hàng nghìn những người Tây tạng mà đã chết tại những bàn tay (của) chính phủ Trung hoa

اعتماد هذه المجموعة على شرف لمئات الالاف من اهالى التبت ان لقوا حتفهم على يد الحكومة الصينية.

Η ομάδα αυτή γίνεται προς τιμήν των εκατοντάδων χιλιάδων Θιβετιανών που πέθαναν στα χέρια της κινεζικής κυβέρνησης.

ito pulutong ay made di parangalan ng ang sandaan ng li Tibetans atipan ng pawid may died at ang makisig ng ang baba pamahalaan.

Тази група е създадена в чест на стотиците хиляди тибетци, загинали под натиска на Китайското правителство.

See grupp on tehtud, et austada tuhandeid tiibetlasi kes on hukkunud Hiina
valitsuse kätetöö pärast.

Acest grup a fost creat in onoarea sutelor de mii de Tibetani care au murit la discretia guvernului Chinez.

Tämä ryhmä on tehty niiden tuhansien Tiibetiläisten muistolle, jotka ovat kuolleet Kiinan hallituksen käsissä.

Оваа група е креирана во чест на стотиците илјади Тибетанци кои загинале од раката на Кинескaтa влада.

Ova grupa je napravjena u čast stotinama i hiljadama Tibetanaca koje je ubila Kineska vlada.

กลุ่มนี้สร้างขึ้นเพื่อระลึกถึงชาวทิเบตนับพันที่ถูกสังหารอย่างโหดร้ายโดยรัฐบาลจีน

Aquest grup ha estat creat en honor als cents de mils de tibetants que han mort a mans del govern xinès.

Þessi grúppa er gerð í minningu þeirra hundruðum þúsunda Tíbeta sem létu lífið af völdum Kínversku ríkisstjórninni.

group.headline: iOGaming.NET - #1 International Gaming Community
group.summary:
[ iOGaming.NET ]
www.iOGaming.NET

Welcome to the iOGaming STEAM Community Group! We are an international multi-gaming community (not a clan) with a wide player base all across the world! We currently officially support Team Fortress 2, Left4Dead Series, Battlefield Bad Company 2, Battlefield 2, Heroes of Newerth, and expanding! All of our members share a common belief of playing together and playing to win! We're the only community to give away free stuff just for playing on our servers, so check out all of our servers and our website! Additionally, we hold tournaments very often so be sure to check back and play in any of one of our FIFTEEN servers throughout the variety of games we offer: TF2, Left4Dead and Battlefield2.

At iOGaming, we do not sell admin or even VIP reserved slots like most other communities do. We firmly believe that you should not have to pay to hold a spot in our servers and that admin's should only be people who genuinely care about the direction of the community and upholding the fairness & quality the absolute ideal community should offer. However we also believe that if you are donating money to help a community run, you should receive not only recognition, but some sort of physical benefits as well. The staff at iOGaming really took the time to think and develop actual in-game benefits that would not effect game play while adding to the fun of the game. We did just that and are now able to offer you (instantly) upon donation, fun benefits to reward you for helping make iO what it is today. Check out the benefits at: http://iOGaming.net/donate

** Apply for the [iO] tag @ http://iogaming.net/signup - We are always looking for some cool new members!

Stop in and join us on any of our 8 TF2 servers below.

group.summary:
The Catterys open for any players who would like to join the friendliest group in TF2 history.

We are players who enjoy the TF2 experiance and bring a smile to the game :D

PVKII Is a Halflife 2 Modification based on 3 teams from times past locked in a never-ending battle for wealth, dominance and power. Pirates, Vikings & Knights II pits each team against one another in a variety of different scenarios enabling a varied, strategic, and fun gameplay. Each team has its overall strengths and weaknesses, as well as each member within those teams contributing special abilities for the success or failure of each goal.

group.headline: Peggle Nights - Extreme Fever Under the Full Moon!
group.summary: The sun has set at the Peggle™ Institute, but the bouncy delight has just begun! Join the Peggle Masters on a dreamtime adventure of alter egos and peg-tastic action. Stay up late to aim, shoot and clear orange pegs from over 60 levels, and bask in Extreme Fever glory. Then, take on 60 Challenges for even more rebounding joy!

group.headline: L4D!
group.summary: Left 4 Dead is a co-op action horror game that casts up to four players in an epic struggle for survival against swarming zombie hordes and terrifying mutant monsters. Created by Valve, creators of Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, and Half-Life.

group.headline: TF2 in a nutshell
group.summary: Team Fortress® 2 (TF2) is the sequel to the game that put class-based, multiplayer team warfare on the map. Play as the flame-throwing Pyro, the room clearing Heavy, or the Spy, a master of disguises. Other classes include: Scout, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, Demoman, or Soldier.

group.headline: /̵͇̿/'̿-̅-̅-̅' Left 4 Dead 2 ︻デ═一
group.summary:
Left 4 Dead 2 is a cooperative first-person shooter game. It is the sequel to the award winning Left 4 Dead. The games current release date is set for November 17, 2009, for Microsoft Window and the Xbox 360. Like the origonal, Left 4 Dead 2 takes place during the aftermath of an apocalyptic pandemic, and focuses on four survivors fighting against hordes of the infected. Several new features will be introduced, such as new types of infected, melee weapons, and a story-arc that connects each of the game's five campaigns together into one full game.


Campaigns:

The Parish, Swamp Fever, Hard Rain, Dark Carnival, The Passing, Dead Center


Weapons:

Firearms:

50 CAL, Auto Shotgun, Auto Shotgun SPAS, AWP, FX, Grenade Launcher, Hunting Rifle, Minigun, MP5 Navy, Rifle, Rifle AK-47, Rifle Desert, Scout, SG-552, Shotgun, Shotgun Chrome, SMG, SMG Silenced, Sniper Military


Secondary Firearms:

Dual Pistol, Magnum, Pistol, Pistol Silver


Melee Weapons:

Axe, Bat , Chainsaw, Guitar, Katana, Knife, Machete, Pan, Tonfa


Supplies:

Main Supplies:

Health kit, Defibrillator, Ammo pack


Secondary Supplies:

Pills, Adrenaline


Explosives:

Molotov, Pipe bomb, CEDA Jar


Ammo upgrades:

Incendiary Ammo, Explosive Ammo, Laser Light


Special Infected:

Charger, Spitter, Jockey, Boomer, Hunter, Smoker, Tank, Witch


Common Infected:

Hazmat, Mudmen, Riot Cops, Clowns, Constuction Worker


Left 4 Dead 2 features a new cast of human survivors, which will include Coach, a high-school football coach with a bad knee; Rochelle, a news reporter for a local television station; Ellis, a mechanic; and Nick, a gambler and conman. While the game was intended to be a continuation of the original, occurring a week after the first game begins, it was decided to create a new group of survivors because of the change in location. In addition to the four playable characters, Left 4 Dead 2 also features a support character in the form of Virgil, a Cajun boat captain, who appears in the game's later three chapters. This differs from the original game, where NPCs made little more than a single appearance.

L4D2 Enthusiasts [Yes-L4D2] was created so Enthusiasts looking forward to Left 4 Dead 2 could talk and get daily news updates about the game that they are looking forward to. We plan on explanding our group, by creating Left 4 Dead 2 servers, later upon the release of the game.

group.groupName: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter
group.summary: Return to the golden age of frantic, non-stop action with Serious Sam’s trademark onslaught of enemies rushing towards you at every turn. From the charging Sirian Werebull to the screaming Headless Kamikaze and the multi-story Ugh-Zan, all of the infamous minions of Notorious Mental have been spectacularly redesigned for Serious Sam HD.

Bluff your enemies to lead your nation to victory, controlling the action using views that range seamlessly from the heart of the battlefield to the full theatre of war.

In R.U.S.E, your brain is your ultimate weapon as you fight a war of perception, where your ability to deceive and mislead your enemy determines success. A first in a strategy game, R.U.S.E reinvigorates the genre by using deception to give new-found depth to the gameplay.

group.headline: .::BF Bad Company 2::.
group.summary:
Battlefield Bad Company 2


Battlefield Bad Company™ 2 brings the spectacular Battlefield gameplay to the forefront of next-gen consoles and PC - featuring best-in-class vehicular combat set across a wide range of huge sandbox maps each with a different tactical focus.

New vehicles like the All Terrain Vehicle (ATV) and the UH-60 transport helicopter allow for all-new multiplayer tactics in the warzone, extensive fine-tuning ensures that this will be the most realistic vehicle combat experience to date.

Tactical destruction is taken to new heights with the updated DICE ‘Frostbite’ engine. Players can now take down entire buildings or create their own vantage points by blasting holes through cover, thereby delivering a unique dynamic experience in every match.

Players can also compete in 4-player teams in 2 exclusive squad-only game modes, fighting together to unlock exclusive team awards and achievements. Spawn on your squad to get straight into the action, and use gadgets such as the tracer dart in-conjunction with the RPG to devastating effect.

Excellence in the battlefield is rewarded with an extensive range of pins, insignias and stars to unlock along with 50 dedicated ranks to achieve.

Variety also extends into the range of customizable kits weapons and vehicles available. With 4 distinct character classes, and weapons, gadgets and specializations players have over 15000 kit variations to discover and master players will be able to fine-tune their preferred fighting style to give them the edge in combat.

All of these features combine to deliver spectacular and unpredictable action moments found nowhere else in a modern warfare experience.

The game also sees the return of the B Company squad in a more mature and intense single player experience where the stakes are higher than ever.

Battlefield 3 (in development)

group.headline: The Empire of the Future has Arrived
group.summary:
Great Britain is an island situated to the northwest of Continental Europe. It is the ninth largest island in the world, and the largest European island. With a population of about 59.6 million people in mid-2008, it is the third most populated island on Earth. Great Britain is surrounded by over 1,000 smaller islands and islets. The island of Ireland lies to its west. Politically, Great Britain may also refer to the island itself together with a number of surrounding islands which comprise the territory of England, Scotland and Wales.

All of the island is territory of the sovereign state the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, and most of the United Kingdom's territory is in Great Britain. The term "Great Britain" (and the abbreviation 'GB') is the traditional 'short form' of the full country title 'the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland', although usage of 'the UK' has increased more recently. Most of England, Scotland, and Wales are on the island of Great Britain, as are their respective capital cities, London, Edinburgh, and Cardiff.

The Kingdom of Great Britain resulted from the political union of the kingdoms of England and Scotland with the Acts of Union 1707 on 1 May, 1707 under Queen Anne.

In 1801, under a new Act of Union, this kingdom merged with the Kingdom of Ireland to create the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. After the Irish War of Independence, most of Ireland seceded from the Union. Currently the kingdom is named the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.


The British Empire was the most powerful nation on the planet at its peak, and arguably the most powerful nation in the entire history of the world. Controlling nearly one fifth of the world's landmasses and one quarter of the planet's population, the phrase "the sun never sets on the British Empire" was indeed quite true. Long live the British Empire!

group.headline: Medal of Honor™ Limited Edition
group.summary:
Medal of Honor Limited Edition
NORTH AMERICA,- [ 2010-10-12 ]
EUROPE-[ 2010-10-15 ]

>Medal of Honor Beta : October 4 for PC

New Medal of Honor promises 'most authentic modern war experience'

Shrugging off years of mediocrity and partially descriptive subtitles, EA's newly announced Medal of Honor reboot will thrust players into a modern milieu: Afghanistan. Set for release in 2010 on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, the new first-person shooter follows the Tier 1 Operator, described as "a relatively unknown entity directly under the National Command Authority who takes on missions no one else can handle," and not described as an oddly militant member of ZZ Top. EA claims that "Tier 1 Operators from the US Special Operations Community" have been involved since the earliest stages of the game's development.

The publisher seems intent on throwing the gauntlet down in the modern war arena (do they still use gauntlets?), promising a "best-in-class single-player campaign" from the minds at EA Los Angeles, as well as a multiplayer component developed by the Battlefield veterans at DICE.

You can bear witness to the game's full unveiling during Spike TV's 2009 Video Game Awards on Saturday, December 12 at 8:00PM PT. You can witness beard in the gallery below.


Electronic Arts began the WWII shooter genre with its Medal of Honor franchise. The series first started with PS1 titles but it really came into its own with the acclaimed 2002 PC game Medal of Honor: Allied Assault. Since then, the series had has a number of addition games on a wide variety of platforms. However it has also taken a back seat to the games in Activision's Call of Duty franchise (developed by Infinity Ward, who originally helped to develop Allied Assault). The Medal of Honor series has never strayed from its WWII war theater but that may change according to a rumor in the latest Electronic Gaming Monthly magazine (and referenced at 1Up.com).

According to the story, EA plans to release a new Medal of Honor game in 2009 but instead of hitting the beaches in Normandy or storming the Pacific islands, the franchise will switch to a modern day setting taking place in Afghanistan. This topical switch, if true, will likely raise more than a few highbrows. We wonder if the game will deal directly with the search for 9/11 terrorist Osama Bin Laden. If so, expect to see more than a few critics of the game in the mainstream press.

● The community outcry before you even played the game were directly in regards to these specific bugs. Nobody asked for cosmetic changes like deathcam, achievements, death and revenge and the steam avatar/name direct link. All from which is originally TF2. CSS definitely isn't like TF2, but it's no doubt that the CSS Beta has borrowed elements from TF2.
CSS has turned into a game and community filled with people who appreciate the game's harshness because it's actually *gasp* demanding on skill. Things such as adjusting the recoil for easier shooting and deathcam to see where your killer came from, that's not skill. That's the casual gamer needing assistance. On the 24th June 2010, Valve released an update to Counter-Strike: Source. Thank you very much, Counter-Strike: Source is DEAD, R.I.P. This document is gaining 5000 signatures of people who agree that Counter-Strike: Source should come back and this new update should be sold as a separate, new game. Valve, listen to your biggest fans and please bring back the game before the update. 8 years of gaming for some of these people has just been throwing down the drain. For the people who are signing this petition, if you would like the new update of Counter-Strike: Source to be sold separately then please put your full name, your game name and your steam username then email this onto ALL your steam friends.

Example: Bob “SlAyeR” Jones // Steamuser111

1. Kane “bufa” Steuer // Rofl2143

If you want to sign it, then go to http://csspetition.darkbb.com/ and post a reply saying the following:
Yes I agree, Fname "GName" LName // SteamUserName

Fname = Your First Name
Gname = Your Game Name
Lname = Your Last Name
SteamUserName = Your steam user name, NOT alias.

group.headline: Coming February 2011
group.summary:
Portal 2 draws from the award-winning formula of innovative gameplay, story, and music that earned the original Portal over 70 industry accolades and created a cult following.

The single-player portion of Portal 2 introduces a cast of dynamic new characters, a host of fresh puzzle elements, and a much larger set of devious test chambers. Players will explore never-before-seen areas of the Aperture Science Labs and be reunited with GLaDOS, the occasionally murderous computer companion who guided them through the original game.

The game’s two-player cooperative mode features its own entirely separate campaign with a unique story, test chambers, and two new player characters. This new mode forces players to reconsider everything they thought they knew about portals. Success will require them to not just act cooperatively, but to think cooperatively.
